New in version 1.3

  • Actually fixed the crash bug that I claimed to have fixed in the last version.

New in version 1.2

  • App is now sandboxed on OS X Lion.
  • Switched from Garbage Collection to ARC.
  • Fixed a crash bug when the user cancels a snipped screenshot.
  • Added an about menu item, which shows some simple instruction for use and credits for the app.

New in version 1.1

  • Added a feature to immediately upload screenshots without them appearing on the desktop at all.
  • Press Cmd+Alt+Shift+3 to take a screenshot and upload it.
  • Press Cmd+Alt+Shift+4 to take a snipping screenshot and upload it.

New in version 1.0

  • Added "Recent Uploads" menu
  • Added "All Uploads" window
  • Added animation while uploading.
  • Added automatic updating via Sparkle.
